name: hotel-booking-agent
description: to deploy, just delete old files in zip and put all new code in zip file, then write this command:  aws lambda update-function-code --function-name smart-office-lex-chatbot-fulfilment-webhook --zip-file fileb://index.zip

scripts.deploy: npm run delzip && npm run dozip && npm run sendzip
scripts.deploylinux: npm run doziplinux && npm run sendzip
scripts.downloadzip_comment: to download alexa code in zip
